com.apriori.apt.reflect

Interface ArAnnotatedElement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArClass, ArConstructor, ArField, ArMethod, ArPackage, ArParameter

    public interface ArAnnotatedElement
    An element that can have annotations. This includes representations of things in the Java programming language which can be annotated, like packages, types, fields, constructors, methods, and parameters.

    The Java programming language also allows local variables (including exception variables defined in catch blocks) to be annotated, but support for this during annotation processing is incomplete, so there currently are no such implementations.

    This interface is analogous to AnnotatedElement, except that it represents a source-level type (during annotation processing) instead of an actual runtime type. Unlike AnnotatedElement, this interface can be used to inspect annotations whose retention policy is RetentionPolicy.CLASS or RetentionPolicy.SOURCE.

    See Also:
    AnnotatedElement

    • Field Detail

      • FROM_ELEMENT

        static final java.util.function.Function<javax.lang.model.element.Element,ArAnnotatedElement> FROM_ELEMENT
        A function that transforms a Element to an ArAnnotatedElement.

        The function will return instances of ArClass, ArField, ArMethod, ArConstructor, ArParameter, or ArPackage. If the specified input element does not represent one of these types of elements then null is returned.

    • Method Detail

      • getAnnotation

        ArAnnotation getAnnotation(ArClass annotationClass)
        Gets the annotation from the object that corresponds to the specified annotation type. This will return an inherited annotation if one exists.

        Returns:
        the corresponding annotation or null if there is no such annotation
